name: Super Backpack
description:
Super Backpack is a 3d Adventure platformer
Status: in prototyping phase

This mean I hard working to code this and get the mechanics and controller felling great, so don't expect see any Artwork so soon :)

To Play you must need to have a gamepad, PS4 controller or similar!

If you downloading the early alpha builds, pls send me some feedback to improve the mechanics and control response. also remember to check every week for updates.
